original_text: The breaker is come up before them: they have broken up, and have passed through the gate, and are gone out by it: and their king shall pass before them, and the Lord on the head of them.
korean_text: 길을 여는 자가 그들 앞에 올라가고 그들은 길을 열어 성문에 이르러서는 그리로 나갈 것이며 그들의 왕이 앞서 가며 여호와께서는 선두로 가시리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: The breaker is come up before them
and have passed through the gate
and are gone out by it
and their king shall pass before them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 왕이 그들 앞을 지나갈 것이며

sentences.original_text: and Lord on the head of them
